item.itemInspectDescription: On the wall there is a picture of your family. As where most pictures are.
item.itemDescription: A picture of your family you pulled from your wall. Man you look really stupid.

item.itemInspectDescription: Pause! Is that a chocolate bar you see? Bruh go grab that!
item.itemDescription: A delicious candy bar. Blessed to you from the sugar gods!

item.itemInspectDescription: In the fridge is a can of melon soda that you snuck back from Japan.
item.itemDescription: Another gift from the sugar gods! Best to drink when cold.

item.itemInspectDescription: An empty cup on the floor of the room. This is kind of gross my guy.
item.itemDescription: An empty cup you found on the floor.Stained with the artificial coloring of soda.

item.itemInspectDescription: You notice a tennis ball in the trashcan. Strange place for a tennis ball...
item.itemDescription: A dirty ball missing some patches. Why are you carrying this?

item.itemInspectDescription: In the middle of the room is your left shoe... Wait where's the other shoe?
item.itemDescription: You're left shoe. A dirty pair of Nike Blazers. Better then owning a pair of Air Monarchs.

item.itemInspectDescription: You pulled a nasty shoe out the dog's mouth. It smells like anger and Fritos.
item.itemDescription: You're right shoe. A dirty pair of Nike Blazers. Soaked in dog drool.
